import { Offer } from '../../types/offers'; type PropertDescriptionProps = { offer: Offer; } function PropertDescription({offer}: PropertDescriptionProps): JSX.Element { return ( <>
{offer.isPremium ? 'Premium' : ''}

{offer.title}

Rating
{offer.rating}
  • {offer.type}
  • {offer.bedrooms} Bedrooms
  • Max {offer.maxAdults} adults
€{offer.price}  night

What's inside

    {offer.goods.map((item) => (
  • {item}
    • ))}
); } export default PropertDescription;
